select.if: SELECT A.CNLT_SEQ , A.CNLT_DETAIL_NO , A.CNLT_PROC_CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CODE WHERE LCODE='001' AND MCODE=A.CNLT_PROC_CD) AS CNLT_PROC_NM , A.CNLT_DATE , A.TELL_NUM , C.USER_NM AS USER_NM , A.REG_DATE , A.RECV_NOTE , A.PROC_NOTE , A.RSRV_DATE , A.TRAN_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM IF_CO_USER_MA WHERE USER_ID = A.TRAN_ID) AS TRAN_NM , A.CNTR_NO , CHNL_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE='00' AND MCODE='00' AND SCODE='00') AS CHNL_CODE_NAME , LCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND LCODE <> '00' AND MCODE='00' AND SCODE='00') AS LCODE_NAME , MCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND MCODE=A.MCODE AND MCODE <> '00' AND SCODE='00') AS MCODE_NAME , SCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND MCODE=A.MCODE AND SCODE=A.SCODE AND SCODE <> '00') AS SCODE_NAME , B.CUST_NM , A.REC_URL FROM TH_CONSULT_DETAIL A , TH_CONSULT B, IF_CO_USER_MA C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNLT_SEQ = B.CNLT_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.CNLT_SEQ = #{cnltSeq} AND A.CNLT_DETAIL_NO = #{cnltDetailNo}

SELECT A.CNLT_SEQ , A.CNLT_DETAIL_NO , A.CNLT_PROC_CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CODE WHERE LCODE='001' AND MCODE=A.CNLT_PROC_CD) AS CNLT_PROC_NM , A.CNLT_DATE , A.TELL_NUM , C.USER_NM AS USER_NM , A.REG_DATE , A.RECV_NOTE , A.PROC_NOTE , A.RSRV_DATE , A.TRAN_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM IF_CO_USER_MA WHERE USER_ID = A.TRAN_ID) AS TRAN_NM , A.CNTR_NO , CHNL_CODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE='00' AND MCODE='00' AND SCODE='00') AS CHNL_CODE_NAME , LCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND LCODE <> '00' AND MCODE='00' AND SCODE='00') AS LCODE_NAME , MCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND MCODE=A.MCODE AND MCODE <> '00' AND SCODE='00') AS MCODE_NAME , SCODE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TH_CONSULT_CODE WHERE CHNL_CODE = A.CHNL_CODE AND LCODE=A.LCODE AND MCODE=A.MCODE AND SCODE=A.SCODE AND SCODE <> '00') AS SCODE_NAME , B.CUST_NM , A.REC_URL FROM TH_CONSULT_DETAIL_HIST A , TH_CONSULT_HIST B, IF_CO_USER_MA C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CNLT_SEQ = B.CNLT_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.CNLT_SEQ = #{cnltSeq} AND A.CNLT_DETAIL_NO = #{cnltDetailNo}
